column4: does anyone know how to solve this problem when installing ATI drivers:http://paste.ubuntu.com/5493
(all the accurate instructions you need): For Ati/NVidia/Matrox video cards, see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto

grub is the default Ubuntu boot manager. Lost grub after installing windows: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows - Making GRUB floppies & other GRUB howtos: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/GrubHowto
